nodes.label: FeeroLink
nodes.description: Toward a world where the unrecognizable becomes recognizable. A new cognitive revolution modeled after the brain of a Visual Thinker.

nodes.label: FeeroLink Studio
nodes.description: A space to implement FeeroLink’s design. Engaging with local communities to implement welfare in practice. Symbol: Stellar

nodes.label: Expression
nodes.description: Designing spaces based on experiences of dignity, human rights, and imagination. Expressive action rooted in personal experience.

nodes.label: Medicine & Society
nodes.description: Integrate with medicine and welfare systems. Using the FeeroLink Viewer to support people with communication difficulties, including the elderly. Visualize background factors and care relay networks.

nodes.label: Asylum-type Welfare Hubs
nodes.description: Developing a self-sustaining, cooperative-style support network. For those with talents, provide management and support to help them utilize their abilities.

nodes.label: Technology
nodes.description: Designing a new OS modeled after a Visual Thinker’s brain. Constructing an integrated database. Future integration with Neuralink.

nodes.label: Theory
nodes.description: Aiming to unify quantum theory and relativity. Layer-based observational cognitive theory.
